original_text: And I will sow them among the people: and they shall remember me in far countries; and they shall live with their children, and turn again.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 여러 백성들 가운데 흩으려니와 그들이 먼 곳에서 나를 기억하고 그들이 살아서 그들의 자녀들과 함께 돌아올지라

sentences.original_text: And I will sow them among the people
and they shall remember me in far countries
and they shall live with their children
